definition: to abstain from eating meat/to be a vegetarian
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)

definition: food given to Buddhist monks as alms
to recite or chant Buddhist scripture
to burn incense and worship Buddha
to pray to Buddha/to chant the names of Buddha
to violate a religious precept/to smoke or drink after giving up
